definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: herbs (coll.), herbage (green, greens)—abs. [[יׇרָק]] De 11:10 + 2 t.; cstr. [[יְרַק]] Is 37:27 = 2Ki 19:26; —[[גַּן־יׇרָק]] De 11:10, 1Ki 21:2; [[אֲרֻחַת יׇרָק]] Pr 15:17; as subst., [[יְרַק דֶּשֶׁא]] Is 37:27 = 2Ki 19:26 green shoots of grass (‖[[עֵשֶׂב שָׂדֶה]], etc.)
